Reviews.Title: Product exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Bbears4fun
Reviews.Content: Although I received the laptop over a week ago I haven't yet had much time to use it due to my old wireless card not being compatbile with the new one.  The item was shipped very quickly and arrived much sooner then the estimated delivery date.  It is hooked-up and I was able to install my mouse driver and connect my external drives.  Hoping to get much use out of this laptop.  No issues so far.  I will update this rating once I have it fully operational.

ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows 8.1 64-Bit; Intel Core i7 Quad Core 4th Gen Haswell CPU (2.4GHz-3.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache)
17.3" Full HD TruBrite® LED Backlit Display (1920x1080); SuperMulti DVD/CD burner; HDMI® & VGA Ports
16GB DDR3L 1600MHz SDRAM (4 Dimm); Intel HD 4600 Graphics; HD Webcam & Microphone; Gigabit LAN
250GB Performance Solid State (SSD) Hard Drive; 750GB Secondary Data Storage; harmon/kardon Quad Speakers
Full Size Backlit Keyboard, Intel AC [2x2] Wi-Fi & Bluetooth v4.0 with WiDi Support, 1 Year Toshiba Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite P75 17.3" Quad Edition Laptop - Intel® CoreTM i7-4700MQ - Full HD 1080p Display - Prestige Silver - 250GB SSD Performance Hard Drive - 750GB Storage - Intel Wireless AC Dual Band - Backlit Keyboard - P70-ABT3N22 with 16GB RAM
